name: Sliding Motocross!
description:
Are you ready to ramp?

Use your reflex skills to dodge obstacles and collect powerups. Be careful not to run out of time during your journey!

Did you know? This game is part of the Totem network of games!
Use your unique Totem Avatars in the game for exclusive features. Don't have an Avatar yet? Get one for free through the Totem Explorer website.

https://totem-explorer.com/
